reviewText:
Robert Cummings, who plays (Bob Collins), is on a tour with two war buddies, selling war bonds. He meets and falls for Lizabeth Scott (Ivy Hothckiss), who comes along to chaperone the 3 men. Bob does not want to fully committ to the relationship and Ivy doesn't find out why until...
Bob's two pals are hanging around too much and can't seem to find women of their own to keep them occupied long enough for Bob to be solo with Ivy. This is the only annoying part of the movie. Overall,.. I enjoyed it.
